source:
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;
-- 1. Tymczasowe widoki na pliki z ADLS Gen2

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_orders
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/orders'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_order_details
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/order_details'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW d_customers
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_sales (
    country_id STRING,
    product_id STRING,
    shipped_date DATE,
    quantity DOUBLE,
    discount DOUBLE,
    amount DOUBLE,
    unit_price DOUBLE,
    order_details_update_date DATE,
    order_update_date DATE

)
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_sales/';

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_bronze_orders AS
WITH orders_trunc AS (
    SELECT
        order_id,
        customer_id,
        TRUNC(order_date, 'MM') AS order_date,
        TRUNC(required_date, 'MM') AS required_date,
        TRUNC(shipped_date, 'MM') AS shipped_date
    FROM bronze_orders
),
joined_orders AS (
    SELECT
        o.order_id,
        c.country_id,
        od.product_id,
        o.shipped_date,
        od.unit_price,
        od.quantity,
        od.discount,
        o.order_date,
        od.update_date AS order_details_update_date,
        o.update_date AS order_update_date
    FROM orders_trunc o
    JOIN bronze_order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id
    JOIN d_customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
),
final_orders AS (
    SELECT
        country_id,
        product_id,
        shipped_date,
        MAX(order_order_details_update_date) AS order_details_update_date,
        MAX(order_update_date) AS order_update_date,
        SUM(quantity) AS quantity,
        SUM(discount) AS discount,
        ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price), 2) AS amount,
        ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
    FROM joined_orders
    GROUP BY country_id, product_id, shipped_date)
SELECT * FROM final_orders;   



CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_aggregated_bronze_orders AS
SELECT * from aggregated_bronze_orders  n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_pos_data s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.shipped_date = n.shipped_date
                      and s.order_details_update_date = n.order_details_update_date
                      and s.order_update_date = n.order_update_date);


-- 3. Przekształcenie i zapis danych do tabeli Silver z użyciem MERGE
MERGE INTO silver.f_sales AS target
USING orders AS source
ON target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.shipped_date = source.shipped_date
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET
        target.quantity = source.quantity,
        target.discount = source.discount,
        target.amount = source.amount,
        target.unit_price = source.unit_price,
        target.order_details_update_date = source.order_details_update_date,
        target.order_update_date = source.order_update_date 
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        target.country_id, target.product_id, target.shipped_date,
        target.quantity, target.discount, target.amount, target.unit_price, target.order_details_update_date, target.order_update_date 
    )
    VALUES (
        source.country_id, source.product_id, source.shipped_date,
        source.quantity, source.discount, source.amount, source.unit_price,source.order_details_update_date,source.order_details_update_date 
    );
